General.Name: IVP Limited
General.Description: IVP Limited manufactures and sells foundry chemicals in India. The company offers resins/binders, foundry coatings, and other allied products for applications in various fields, such as foundries, composites, insulation, and refractory, as well as ferrous and non-ferrous foundries. It also provides polyurethane systems for use in footwear and flexible packaging industry, as well as composite, insulation, and refractory resins. The company also exports its products. IVP Limited was incorporated in 1929 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
General.Address: Shashikant Narayan Redij Marg, Mumbai, India, 400033
